p: Aromatic water (100 mL), come out from each treatment, was shaken and then decanted three times with diethyl ether (50 mL) in a separator funnel. The organic phases were separated, and then the diethyl ether was evaporated. To absorb water along with the essential oil, anhydrous sodium sulphate (Na 2SO 4) was used. Remain solvent was evaporated by nitrogen gas to get concentrated oily fragrant volatile fraction. It was stored at 4 Â°C and dark place for next analyses process ( 28).
